articles.title: Australians collecting torches as part of an enlightened international community online - ABC News
articles.description: Spending 20 hours of your free time testing and reviewing a torch for social media may not appeal to everyone, but for a large community of self-professed "torch nerds", enlightening regular "muggles" with the right information can be incredibly rewarding.
articles.content:
Most Australian households will have a few torches here and there  some working, some flat, broken or forgotten but for the likes of Pat from Melbourne, that number is closer to 180.

articles.title: Albanese went into national cabinet with Australia engulfed in an energy crisis. But the premiers came with other concerns - ABC News
articles.description: The creation of national cabinet during the pandemic put the premiers on the same platform as the PM. But Albanese may not share their enthusiasm, and could soon find himself standing in a perilous position, writes Brett Worthington.
articles.content:
